name: gingerbread man
lyric:
Sing humpty
Sing dumpty
Sing dickery dan
Sing hey and sing ho for the gingerbread man
His smile is so sweet and his form is so neat
He has gingerbread shoes on his gingerbread feet

He has gingerbread shoes on his gingerbread feet

Sing humpty
Sing dumpty
Sing dickery dan
Sing hey and sing ho for the gingerbread man
His smile is so sweet and his form is so neat
He has gingerbread shoes on his gingerbread feet

He has gingerbread shoes on his gingerbread feet
